post.date: Posted: Wed Aug 10, 2005 10:41 pm Post subject: Tutorial List : TEXTURES
post.author: kat
post.body:
Place any and all tutorials links in here to do with creating Textures for Doom 3 (or nextGen titles).

DO NOT post tutorial requests, see this topic for that.
_________________
Co-Admin - Modelling and modding tutorials and tips

Last edited by kat on Wed Aug 10, 2005 11:03 pm; edited 1 time in total

post.date: Posted: Wed Aug 10, 2005 11:00 pm Post subject:
post.author: kat
post.body:
Textures
How to create DDS textures using the Compressonator
How to create texture for Doom 3
Texture creation pt.1
Texture creation pt.2
creating bumpmaps from real World photographs
Using the GIMP to create normalmaps
using 'renderbumpflat' to create textures
'renderbumpflat' tricks and tips
creating bumpmaps from images pt.1
creating bumpmaps from images pt.2
Creating basic Quake 3 style textures

Materials (shaders)
Quick and Dirty Material primer
Does 'twosided' work with MD5 models
Material 'syntax'
'polygonoffset' parameter info

Special Effects (sfx)

Sky Portals/Boxes
How to make a SkyBox from photos
Assembling a SkyBox
_________________
Co-Admin - Modelling and modding tutorials and tips
